channel.title: Template i made in like 20 minutes
channel.description:
I made this template for Kimber because he couldn't quite get the one he was making perfect.
I think it truned out really nice! Kimber made the logo and chose the font in the banner, i made the rest :P
http://www.ownaclub.com/site/?computers
Any ways to improve it?
Thanks, O1R.
[hr] [sup]updated because of typo[/sup]

item.title: Template i made in like 20 minutes
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:6, topic:152501”]Did you actually make it?
The language on the template, I thought you were dutch…
How many language do you speak lol.
Nice design btw[/quote]
The language on there is the typical thing to put on templates that you aren’t using, you’re just showing off or something At least, as far as I know

As for the template, that’s not bad. I’m in the process of making my own template, but I keep running into trouble with my CSS and shit… Harder than I thought xD

Read full topic
item.source: Template i made in like 20 minutes

item.title: Template i made in like 20 minutes
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Not too bad for 20 minutes. Would probably look better if you made the darker gray bars a more blue-ish color. Something about that color is messing with my head.

Also, orange text and arrows can look great on gray websites, but it really doesn’t fit in well with your site because of the blue. I would make those either a shade of gray or blue as well.

-Alexia

Read full topic
item.source: Template i made in like 20 minutes
